title: Date Picker widget exists.
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing the date picker
custom_expected: It exists

title: Date picker allows user to access starting lineups from any day/month/year
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When using the date picker
custom_expected: Then user can access starting lineups from any day/month/year

title: MLB widget dropdown exists
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing the MLB dropdown
custom_expected: it exists

title: MLB dropdown contains all 30 clubs in alphabetical order
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing the MLB dropdown widget
custom_expected: Then the dropdown includes all 30 teams in alphabetical order

title: All game times are in Eastern Standard Time.
custom_preconds: Given on the MLB Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing the game time of the matchups
custom_expected: Then all game times are eastern.

title: Page shows all MLB matchups
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing the matchups for the day
custom_expected: Then all scheduled Major League Baseball games are listed.

title: All starting lineups show under the teams matchup (when available)
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a matchup
custom_expected: Then the teams starting lineups show under their matchup (if already announced)

title: Show TBD when lineup is yet to be announced.
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a teams matchup with the starting lineup not yet announced
custom_expected: Then show TBD in place of the lineup

title: Show pitchers headshots under team logos
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a teams matchup
custom_expected: Then show pitchers headshots under the team logo

title: Show the home stadium under game time.
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a teams matchup
custom_expected: Then show the home stadium underneath the game time.

title: Show starting pitchers W/L, ERA and SO as stat line under headshot.
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a games pitching matchup
custom_expected: Then show starting pitchers W/L, ERA and SO as stat line under headshot.

title: Show wether pitcher is RHP/LHP
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a game matchups pitching matchup
custom_expected: Then show wether a pitcher is a RHP (Right handed Pitcher) or LHP (Left Handed Pitcher)

title: At the top of each matchup show Away team @ Home team
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing the matchups for the day
custom_expected: Then at the top of each matchup show Away team @ Home team

title: All players listed link to their player page.
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: W hen viewing a teams starting lineup
custom_expected: Then all players link to their player page

title: All teams link to team pages
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a teams matchup
custom_expected: Then all teams link to team pages

title: All product links exist and function correctly.
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing a teams matchup
custom_expected: Then all product links exist and function correctly. This includes: Preview/Gameday/Wrap, MLB.tv

title: SEO Meta/Title match description
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing page source (view-source:https://www.mlb.com/starting-lineups)
custom_expected:
Then Metadescription and title match description set by SEO Manager. 

https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/FEDE-5649

title: Dont show game time for past lineups
custom_preconds: Given on the Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing the lineups from a past date
custom_expected: Then user will not be able to see game time.

title: Starting Lineup data sources are coming from the right endpoint.
custom_preconds: Given you are viewing the Starting Lineups page Data Sources
custom_steps: When viewing the schedules API Hydrate
custom_expected: Then it is correctly coming from http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=492498&hydrate=lineups and http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?gamePk=529418&hydrate=lineups

title: Show game date for past lineups:  (Final, PPD, SuSP)
custom_preconds: Given on a Clubs Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When viewing games in the Past Lineups section
custom_expected: Then display game date for each past game (Final, PPD, SuSP)

title: Show game time specific to club location.
custom_preconds: Given on a Clubs Starting Lineups page
custom_steps: When you are viewing the Cubs starting lineup (Central Timezone)
custom_expected: Then the game time shows specific to club location therefore showing all games in Central time.

title: All 30 clubs have a link to their own Starting lineups page.
custom_preconds: Given you are viewing a Clubs starting lineups page
custom_steps: When you are looking for ay of the MLB clubs
custom_expected:
Then all 30 clubs have an active and fully functioning Starting lineups page unique to their club. 

https://www.mlb.com/cubs/roster/starting-lineups
https://www.mlb.com/yankees/roster/starting-lineups
https://www.mlb.com/mets/roster/starting-lineups
